frame.name: Part_whole
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame is concerned with nouns denoting a part or parts of a <fen>Whole</fen> entity . The <fen>Part</fen> is not defined relative to the <fen>Whole</fen>'s orientation, center, or edge and is not ordered. We also annotate properties of the <fen>Part</fen>, e.g. relating to its size.
<ex>Kim forgot a <fex name="Part_prop">large</fex> <t><fex name="Part">part</fex></t> <fex name="Whole">of the story</fex>.</ex>
<ex>Abby ate only the <fex name="Orientation">top</fex> <t><fex name="Part">half</fex></t> <fex name="Whole">of the cake</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Part
FE.definition: <def-root>A <fen>Part</fen> of a larger <fen>Whole</fen>.<ex>Sergey had <t><fex name="Part">half</fex></t> of the pizza for breakfast.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Whole
FE.definition: <def-root>An undivided entity having all its <fen>Part</fen>s. <ex>Sergey had <t>half</t> <fex name="Whole">of the pizza</fex> for breakfast.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Part_prop
FE.definition: <def-root>A property relating to the <fen>Part</fen> of a <fen>Whole</fen>.<ex>Sue painted a <fex name="Part_prop">big</fex> <t><fex name="Part">section</fex></t> <fex name="Whole">of the room</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Orientation
FE.definition:
<def-root>This is a property of the <fen>Part</fen> that determines the portion of the <fen>Part</fen>.
<ex>Abby ate only the <fex name="Orientation">top</fex> <t><fex name="Part">half</fex></t> <fex name="Whole">of the cake</fex> . </ex></def-root>

FE.name: System
FE.definition: <def-root>A system of organization of the <fen>Part</fen>s within the <fen>Whole</fen>, of which a <fen>Part</fen> is identified with a <fen>Name</fen> .</def-root>

FE.name: Name
FE.definition: <def-root>A label applied to a <fen>Part</fen> of a <fen>Whole</fen> in order to identify the <fen>Part</fen> within some <fen>System</fen>.</def-root>
